meanings.definition: A variant form of an enzyme.
meanings.sent1: Isoenzymes are like different versions of a recipe for baking cookies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the isoenzymes to understand their unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The isoenzymes had a party, each bringing a slightly different cake to share.
meanings.sent4: The isoenzymes danced together, each moving to its own beat.
meanings.sent5: The isoenzymes stood out in the crowd, each wearing a distinct hat.

meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze the same reaction but have different amino acid sequences.
meanings.sent1: Isoenzymes work together to speed up chemical reactions in the body.
meanings.sent2: The isoenzymes in the liver help break down toxins efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The isoenzymes competed in a race to see who could catalyze the reaction faster.
meanings.sent4: The isoenzymes were like a diverse team, each bringing a unique skill to the table.
meanings.sent5: The isoenzymes collaborated harmoniously, despite their individual differences.
